mapper.sql: LECTURER_ID, LECTURER_NUMBER, LECTURER_NAME, LECTURER_NAME_EN,LECTURER_TYPE, CODE, LECTURER_GRADE, IS_INTERNAL_LECTURER, LECTURER_IMG, LECTURER_INTRODUCTION,LECTURER_INTRODUCTION_EN, STATUS, CREATOR,CREATOR_ID, CREATE_TIME, OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME,CREATOR_ID
mapper.insert: insert into TOM_LECTURE ( LECTURER_NUMBER, LECTURER_NAME, LECTURER_TYPE, CODE, LECTURER_GRADE, IS_INTERNAL_LECTURER, LECTURER_IMG, LECTURER_INTRODUCTION, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATOR_ID,CREATE_TIME, OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME) values ( #{lecturerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecturerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecturerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecturerGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isInternalLecturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecturerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecturerIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update TOM_LECTURE
LECTURER_NUMBER = #{lecturerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LECTURER_NAME = #{lecturerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LECTURER_NAME_EN = #{lecturerNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LECTURER_TYPE = #{lecturerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LECTURER_GRADE = #{lecturerGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_INTERNAL_LECTURER = #{isInternalLecturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LECTURER_IMG = #{lecturerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LECTURER_INTRODUCTION = #{lecturerIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LECTURER_INTRODUCTION_EN = #{lecturerIntroductionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where LECTURER_ID = #{lecturerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TOM_LECTURE set LECTURER_NUMBER = #{lecturerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LECTURER_NAME = #{lecturerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LECTURER_NAME_EN = #{lecturerNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LECTURER_TYPE = #{lecturerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LECTURER_GRADE = #{lecturerGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_INTERNAL_LECTURER = #{isInternalLecturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LECTURER_IMG = #{lecturerImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LECTURER_INTRODUCTION = #{lecturerIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LECTURER_INTRODUCTION_EN = #{lecturerIntroductionEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where LECTURER_ID = #{lecturerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from TOM_LECTURE where STATUS='Y'
and INSTR(LECTURER_NAME,#{lecturerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0

select from TOM_LECTURE where STATUS='Y'
and INSTR(LECTURER_NAME,#{lecturerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0
select LECTURER_ID,LECTURER_NAME from TOM_LECTURE where STATUS='Y'
select LECTURER_ID,LECTURER_NAME from TOM_LECTURE where code=#{code,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select round(AVG(LECTURER_AVERAGE), 1) from TOM_COURSES where INSTR(LECTURERS,#{lecturerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})>0 and COURSE_ID in (select COURSE_ID from TOM_GRADE_RECORDS where grade_type='L')
